title: An extension for everything
body: Just today at work while using the only "<a title="real browser" href="http://www.mozilla.org/products/firefox" >real browser</a>" I got a little close-happy with the tabs and accidentally closed one I wanted to keep open.  If only there were a way for idiots like me to undo my idiotic actions... it looks like I'll have <a href="http://texturizer.net/firefox/extensions/#undoclosetab">3 chances</a>.

2004-04-19
